title: Which are some beautiful Hindi songs, but not love songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Love is not the only genre. There are so many great songs with categories like Party, Friendship, Petriotics, Childhood are just few to count. I am listing few of them which I could recall right now. All but love (with no specific order of my favorites) - 1. Paathshala - Rang De Basanti  2. Yaaron - Pal (KK Album)  3. Sadi Gali - Tanu Weds Manu  4. Old School Girl - Tanu Weds Manu Returns  5. Taare Zameen Par - title track  6. Chhodo Kal Ki Baatein - Hum Hindustani  7. Dhaka Laka Buka - Yuva  8. Roobaroo - Rang De Basanti  9. Jo Bhi Main - Rockstar  10. Bhaage Re Mann - Chameli  11. Dil Chahta Hai - title track  12. Haan Yahi Rasta Hai Tera - Lakshya  11. Yeh Taara - Swades  12. Chale Chalo and Mitwa - Lagaan  13. Allah Warriyan - Yaariyaan (also Sunny Sunny fron YY Honey Singh)  14. Rail Gaadi - Aashirwaad  15. Yaadein title track  16. Nani Teri Morni Ko Mor Le Gaye  And many more…

These are some I remember & like: Saaiyaan - Ta Ra Rum PumKal Ho Na Ho - Kal Ho Na HoPanchi Nadiya Pawan Ke Jhoke - RefugeeSapno Se Bhare Naina - Luck By Chancekuch alag khel kardar ke - Shafqat Amanat Ali(Singer)Yeh Hai meri Kahani - ZindaRehmat Zara - lamha (sanjay dutt)Garajs Baras sawan ghir aayo - PaapChal rahi hai Saanse beh raha hai lahu - ZindaShola Shola Shola - London DreamsChalla - Jab Tak hai JaanBulla ki Janna Mai Kaun - Rabbi ShergillHai Junoon - New YorkAazmale Aazmale - Taxi No 9211Chod Aaye Hum Who Galiyan - MaachisAye Khuda - MurderPhir Mohabbat - MurderSamay Ka Pahiya - BhoothnathApne To Apne Hote Hain - ApneYa Ali - GangsterBheegi Bheegi - GangsterZindagi ki Yahi Reet Hai - Mr. IndiaBaghban Rab Hai Baghban - BaghbanZindagi Har Kadam Ek Nayi Jung Hai - Meri JungRote Hue Aate Hai Saab - LawarisAzma Luck Azma - LuckNadaan Parinde Ghar Aaja - RockstarKar Har Maidan Fateh - SanjuKyun Main Jaagoon - Patiala HouseSEMI-LOVE Songs: ```````````````` Hairat - Anjan AnjaniChaiyya Chaiyya - Dil SeZindagi Iss Tarah Se Lagne Lagi - MurderNo-Love Songs : ``````````````` Kyun Kisi Ko - Tere NaamAbhi Naz hai Tote Dil Ko - Humko Diwana Kar GayeKab Se Usko Dhundta Hun - Billu BarbarChaan Se Jo Tote Koi Sapna - Om Shanti OmLaye Vi Na Gayee - (Shah Rukh Khan - don't remember movie name :| )Oye Raju Pyar Na Karyo - Had Kar Di AapneTujhe Bhula Diya - Anajan AnjaniTune Jo Na Kaha Mai Woh Sunta Gaya - New YorkTu jo Nahi Hai to Kuch Bhi Nahi Hai - Woh Lamhe
